phptagssmw-ext-arrays-not-installed: Error message when trying to use functionality from the [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Arrays Arrays] extension without it being installed.
phptagssmw-ext-sqi-not-installed: Error message when trying to use functionality from the [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/User:Vedmaka/Semantic_Query_Interface Semantic Query Interface] extension without it being installed.
